title: Any new information about the permanent balanced urf mode?
body: is there any new information? did they made AR urf recently to gather more statistics? they take a loooooot of time doing this, this ought to be good thats for sure. i know the lol forum consist of mostly kids especially the NA one BUT this message goes towards the rare older people who read this message. pls only comment if you have some information, ty. i asked this on the EUW forum aswell, but seems like noone there has any new information so thats why i ask here, too even though the chances to find someone with valueable information is even lower. and p.s. sry for my adult behaviour i know its in the rules to keep your "adult content" away but riot support also told me its ok to ask this in the forum every now and then

replies.body: AR URF is a mode that really doesn't come around too often due to the fact that when it's up, people typically aren't able to play any other game modes XD. There's still a chance for it to come around as a part of the Rotating Game Modes though!

good too know that its not around that often, that means they already have the statistics they need. that means that probably a permanent balanced urf mode isnt that far away. but sadly i heard about urf comming for a weekend in 2 weeks? that would mean that i was wrong and it might actually take even longer until they release it balanced and permanent
